biotools.summary:
gap-free chromosome-scale assembly with long reads.

Abstract High-quality genome assembly has wide applications in genetics and medical studies. However, it is still very challenging to achieve gap-free chromosome-scale assemblies using current workflows for long-read platforms.

bioschemas.name: GALA
